amendment.description: To provide coverage for dental and oral health care, hearing care, and vision care under the Medicare program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5211 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 3 - 97. Record Vote Number: 292.

action.text: Amendment SA 5211 proposed by Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 5194. (consideration: CR S4172-4177; text as modified: CR S4172-4177) To provide coverage for dental and oral health care, hearing care, and vision care under the Medicare program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5211 proposed by Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 5194.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 5211 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 3 - 97. Record Vote Number: 292.
